summary:
Dragonplate and Daedric weapons retexture
(I still need help with this file, see description)
descriptionHtml:
Retextures with an icy look.

HELP!
I still don\'t know what controls the red glow on daedric weaponry. I\'d like to add a blueish glow to the weapons instead of the red one so the set would match better with the title. If anyone knows how to change this please let me know. Credit will be given of course.

Note: some red tones are from enchantments but I mean the natural red glow of theese weapons.

I recomend using the following mod to remove the glow from the weapons:
>Daedric glow remover by Ryuujin<
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2589

Feel free to edit the files anyway you want. Just give proper credit.

Have fun.
author: Kameltosis
